sys_ui_page.description: List to show the SOAP Return Values
sys_ui_page.html:
//var test = 'g: evaluate is executed'; //perform the soap lookup var s = new sn_ws.SOAPMessageV2('x_amfai_cacmdba.PartySearchServiceV7', 'searchParty'); s.setStringParameterNoEscape('firstName', 'policy'); s.setStringParameterNoEscape('AddressMatchBy', 'EXACT'); s.setStringParameterNoEscape('stateCode', 'wi'); s.setStringParameterNoEscape('partnerIdentifier', 'AFI'); s.setStringParameterNoEscape('lastName', 'jp'); var response = s.execute(); var responseBody = response.getBody(); var status = response.getStatusCode(); //make XML of the response var partySearchResponse = new XMLDocument2(); partySearchResponse.parseXML(responseBody); var partyIdentifier = partySearchResponse.getNodeText("//ns1:partyIdentifier"); if (partyIdentifier != null){ var count = 0; var countS = ''; var j = 2; var allPartyIds = []; var allfNames = []; for (var i=1; j>i; i++){ var partyNode = partySearchResponse.getNode('//ns1:PartySearchResult['+i+']'); var partyNodeString = partyNode.toString(); if (partyNode.toString() == null || partyNode.toString() == 'null'){ break; } else{ var partySearchResponse2 = new XMLDocument2(); partySearchResponse2.parseXML(partyNodeString); var partyId = partySearchResponse2.getNodeText('//ns1:partyIdentifier'); allPartyIds.push(partyId); var fName = partySearchResponse2.getNodeText('//ns1:firstName'); allfNames.push(fName); var lName = partySearchResponse2.getNodeText('//ns1:lastName'); count = count + 1; countS = count.toString(); } j = i+2; } }

Number of Matches: ${count}

Status: ${status}

Test2 = ${jvar_partyIds}


Select Customer Id First Name Last Name
${jvar_partyIds} ${jvar_fNames[1]} ${lName}
sys_ui_page.name: insured_list
